project.title: Sysmon-CLI
project.description: A lightweight terminal-based system monitoring utility optimized for Mac & Linux power users. Delivers real-time visualization of CPU utilization, memory allocation, disk I/O activity, and network statistics. Leverages efficient low-level system calls to ensure minimal performance impact while providing comprehensive system insights.
project.progress: Architecture planning completed. Initial implementation of CPU/memory tracking modules in progress.

project.title: SysDash Ultra
project.description: An advanced system monitoring dashboard that provides real-time visualization of CPU, RAM, process trees, GPU utilization, disk activity, and power metrics through an interactive interface. Features predictive performance analytics, hierarchical process visualization, and customizable threshold-based alerting.
project.progress: Backend core development underway with UI wireframing in progress.

project.title: NetViz Pro
project.description: A cutting-edge network traffic analysis tool that renders inbound and outbound connections as an interactive 3D force-directed graph. Provides application-specific traffic monitoring, anomalous connection detection, and sophisticated filtering capabilities with stunning visual representations.
project.progress: Concept design and planning completed with UI prototype in active development.

project.title: CodeGrep
project.description: A high-performance, syntax-aware code search tool that understands programming language structures including function definitions, variable declarations, and partial queries. Utilizes abstract syntax tree parsing via Tree-sitter to deliver precise search results that respect code semantics rather than mere text matching.
project.progress: Implementation with advanced file indexing and search optimization in active development.

project.title: Neovim Config
project.description: A meticulously crafted Neovim configuration optimized for professional software development workflows. Features custom plugins, intuitive keybindings, intelligent code completion, and language-specific optimizations designed to maximize productivity and reduce context-switching.
project.progress: Ongoing refinement with regular updates based on workflow improvements.

project.title: apple_music.nvim
project.description: A Neovim plugin that integrates with Apple Music, allowing users to control playback directly from their editor. Features include play/pause, track skipping, and real-time display of the currently playing song. Designed for seamless music control without leaving the coding environment.
project.progress: In development.

project.title: 2077.nvim
project.description: A Cyberpunk 2077-inspired Neovim theme designed with a futuristic neon aesthetic. Features optimized syntax highlighting, seamless lualine integration, and customizable UI elements. Provides an immersive and highly readable coding experience with vibrant color contrasts and ergonomic design considerations.
project.progress: Fully completed and available for use.

project.title: QueryCrust
project.description: A sophisticated web-based database query management tool with an intuitive interface for optimizing and executing complex database operations. Built with modern web technologies and designed to simplify working with large and complex datasets through visual query building and optimization suggestions.
project.progress: Completed and fully functional with all core features implemented.

project.title: AutoSort
project.description: A background file organization daemon that automatically categorizes and sorts files based on configurable rule sets. Supports intelligent sorting based on file type, naming patterns, metadata extraction, and content recognition through OCR processing.
project.progress: Core file detection and rule-based sorting logic implemented with OCR support in development.

project.title: WorkTime
project.description: An intelligent iOS application designed to automatically track productive hours through smart detection of active work sessions. Analyzes app usage patterns, device movement signatures, and Screen Time API data to generate comprehensive productivity analytics and trend visualizations.
project.progress: User interface design completed with data tracking integration in progress.

project.title: ShadowedHunter
project.description: A sophisticated Metroidvania-style game featuring intricate puzzles, advanced combat mechanics, and immersive storytelling. Built with a compelling narrative arc, character progression systems, and dynamic level design. Incorporates physics-based interactions, AI-driven enemy behaviors, and a comprehensive inventory management system.
project.progress: Planning and development phase. Character animations and level layouts in active design.

project.title: Pot Pot Golf
project.description: A physics-based 2D mini-golf simulation featuring realistic ball dynamics, variable terrain properties, and intelligent AI opponents. Players strategically control initial velocities and angles to navigate challenging courses with the fewest shots possible while contending with customizable friction and obstacle settings.
project.progress: Completed with full gameplay features, multiple courses, and AI opponent functionality.

project.title: Frisia
project.description: A multiplayer Frisian Draughts game featuring real-time move validation, player-vs-player mode, and AI opponents. Implements a robust WebSocket server for seamless online play with intelligent move validation, disconnection handling, and game state recovery. AI opponents utilize Minimax and Deep Q-Network (DQN) algorithms for challenging gameplay.
project.progress: Core game logic implemented with multiplayer server deployment in progress.

project.title: Thynkly
project.description: A comprehensive knowledge management platform combining note-taking, interactive mind mapping, and AI-driven flashcard generation. Designed to help users organize, visualize, and retain information efficiently. Features include real-time data synchronization, LaTeX support, collaborative editing, and AI-powered insights to enhance learning.
project.progress: Application in active development, focusing on expanding features and refining user experience.

project.title: BitVoyager
project.description: A browser-based gamified programming education platform where users complete interactive coding challenges in a simulated development environment. Features an XP-based progression system, skill trees, and a comprehensive curriculum covering multiple programming paradigms.
project.progress: Interactive shell prototype completed with curriculum content in ongoing development.

project.title: PyNexus
project.description: An intuitive iOS application designed to introduce beginners to Python programming through interactive exercises, visual feedback, and progressive challenges. Features step-by-step tutorials, real-time code execution, and achievement-based learning to keep users engaged and motivated.
project.progress: Initial concept and design completed. Project currently on hold.

project.title: Zvezda
project.description: A terminal-based Git repository manager and dashboard built using the Charm stack. Zvezda provides real-time insights, visual summaries, and interactive tooling for developers managing multiple repositories. Features include commit analytics, scheduled routines, AI commit suggestions, and integrated repository cleanup utilities.
project.progress: Repo overview dashboard completed with commit tools and AI integration actively developed.

project.title: Project Vault
project.description: A confidential long-term initiative exploring new human-computer interfaces. Currently under wraps. Details will be revealed in a later development phase.
project.progress: Internal R&D ongoing.

project.title: EnronBox
project.description: A local search and analysis tool designed to explore and dissect the Enron email dataset with forensic precision. Provides semantic search, social graph mapping, and metadata filtering capabilities for investigative or educational purposes.
project.progress: Search indexing complete. Metadata graphing and NLP-based filtering in development.

project.title: Psycho
project.description: A professional portfolio website built for a certified psychopedagogue. Showcases her services, background, and philosophy with a modern, animated interface. Emphasizes clarity, elegance, and emotional warmth through floating elements, carousel images, and subtle interactivity.
project.progress: Live and production-ready. Regular updates for styling, SEO, and accessibility improvements.

project.title: Zarya
project.description: A planned self-hosted infrastructure hub designed to consolidate personal services like file sync, notes, scheduling, AI inference endpoints, and dashboarding. Envisioned as a modular, privacy-focused, locally controlled system for developers and power users.
project.progress: Initial architecture drafted. Development not yet started.
